ModMetaData.name: Filth Creates Trash
ModMetaData.author: Sokyran, Hush
ModMetaData.description:
Do you like my mods? You can support me on Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/sokyran
Addon to Vanilla Recycling Expanded - you need to have it installed and enabled!
The idea for this mod is quite simple - cleaning filth off the ground will produce trash, which you'll need to properly take care of.
Ways in which trash is generated (configurable): - Pawn sweeping floors - Rain cleaning filth (off by default) - Cleaning trash bins from Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Self-cleaning floors from Vanilla Expanded Framework or Biomes! Core (off by default)
The majority of the trash will be the most basic trash. However, there's a small (configurable) chance to get a rare type of trash (like stabilized alloypacks). On top of that, some types of filth are guaranteed to only produce specific type of trash - biological filth will (in general) produce reclaimed biopacks, while chemfuel puddles will produce reactive chempacks.
Includes built-in compat for a selection of mods.
